Product Title: Doctor Who: S10 Part1 (BD)
Review Date: 2017/11/09
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV
Product Description: ['Doctor Who: S10 Part1 (BD)', 'Doctor Who Series 10 will see Peter Capaldi embark on his thrilling final chapter as the Twelfth Doctor as well as the introduction of brand new companion Pearl Mackie as Bill Potts and the return of Matt Lucas as Nardole. Fantastic adventures and terrifying monsters await the team of heroes as they journey through space and time in this latest instalment of the globally-renowned drama. Expect laughter, danger and exhilarating escapades in this final series under the helm of lead writer and executive producer Steven Moffat.', ']]>']

reference_summary:
Logan
Hugh Jackman  (Actor),     Patrick Stewart  (Actor),     James Mangold  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["It's the year 2029, and much of the world's mutant population has succumbed to a genocidal, man-made virus. As a down-and-out Logan (Hugh Jackman, in his final appearance as the character) comes to terms with his failing healing factor, he and an ailing Charles Xavier (Patrick Stewart) must protect Laura (Dafne Keen)-a young genetically bred mutant with powers similar to Logan's-from the evil organization that created her. With Richard E. Grant, Boyd Holbrook, Stephen Merchant."]

Spirited Away [Blu-ray]
Daveigh Chase  (Actor),     Lauren Holly  (Actor),     Hayao Miyazaki  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
["From Hayao Miyazaki, one of the most celebrated filmmakers in the history of animated cinema, comes the Oscar(R)-winning triumph (2002, Best Animated Feature Film), filled with astonishing beauty and epic adventure, a dazzling masterpiece for the ages. SPIRITED AWAY is a wondrous fantasy about a young girl, Chihiro, trapped in a strange new world of spirits. When her parents undergo a mysterious transformation, she must call on the courage she never knew she had to free herself and return her family to the outside world. an unforgettable story, brimming with creativity, SPIRITED AWAY will take you on a journey beyond your imagination. It's a fantastic tale the whole family will want to experience over and over again on Disney Blu-ray!"]

profile:
**User Summary:**

This user has a strong preference for action and adventure films, particularly in the superhero genre, and enjoys high-quality animated features. Their latest acquisition reflects an enduring passion for visually striking content, favoring Blu-ray formats for enhanced clarity and detail. A keen interest in established talent shines through, as they appreciate renowned actors and directors.

Recently, the user has demonstrated enthusiasm for long-standing science fiction narratives, indicating a love for imaginative and fantastical storytelling within adventure genres. They are drawn to characters and plots rich in emotional depth and development, showcasing a desire for films that blend entertainment with profound experiences. Their high ratings and feedback emphasize this commitment to production quality and storytelling clarity.

The user remains engaged with series that offer exhilarating escapades and intriguing adventures, reinforcing their attraction to character-driven narratives. Their evolving tastes indicate a discerning viewer who seeks out diverse storytelling formats while maintaining a strong interest in high-caliber cinematic experiences. Overall, they continue to enjoy content that enriches their film repertoire, balancing classic genres with innovative narratives that captivate and entertain.
